thread.section_title: Sheraton Kampala Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Uganda) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: HOTEL WITH EVERYTHING
thread.title_full: HOTEL WITH EVERYTHING - Review of Sheraton Kampala Hotel, Kampala, Uganda - TripAdvisor

author: SANDY M
title: HOTEL WITH EVERYTHING
text:
Excellent stay here, staff couldn't do enough for you, excellent food, lovely rooms with nice views, hotel set in its own gardens so nice and relaxing. Used the spa for a back massage which was wonderful, felt like a new person.
Attended a black tie event here and everything went very well. Lovely pool area and even has a squash court
